attributes.action: Campaign for Uber license to be renewed
attributes.background: We are outraged by TFL's decision not to renew Uber's license.  Drivers are friendly, kind, caring and above all want to provide a good service.  We believe the removal of this service will endanger individuals who can not afford alternative taxis & takes London's economy backwards.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
